text: niṅṅaḷkku kāṇān kaḻiyunna tūṇukaḷeānnumillāte avan ākāśaṅṅaḷe sr̥ṣṭiccu. bhūmiyil ūnniyuṟacca parvataṅṅaḷuṇṭākki. bhūmi niṅṅaḷeyuṅkeāṇṭ ulaññupēākātirikkān. atilavan sakalayinaṁ jīvajālaṅṅaḷeyuṁ vyāpippiccu. mānattuninnu maḻa vīḻtti. atuvaḻi bhūmiyil nāṁ sakalayinaṁ mikacca sasyaṅṅaḷēyuṁ muḷappiccu
